page.title: 15Industry
page.content: The Leekbrook Dye Works is the largest single employer in the area, with dairy farming the 2nd occupation. New industrial units have been built at Leekbrook by Cosira. These are quite small, up to 5000sq.ft., and are occupied by an upholstery frame maker, a knitting firm, and an agricultural engineer producing cattle pens, livestock weighing machines etc. The old paper mill site has been revitalised by a machine tool maker, a firm putting special coatings on paper i.e flourescent colours, a builders merchant, a small chemical factory and a printer producing stick-on labels. Home industry includes car maintenance and welding.
